mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_attendance (user_id, consecutive_days, reward_claimed) VALUES (#{userId}, #{consecutiveDays}, #{rewardClaimed}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE consecutive_days = VALUES(consecutive_days), reward_claimed = VALUES(reward_claimed), updated_at = NOW()
mapper.update: UPDATE user_attendance SET reward_claimed = FALSE, quiz_solved = FALSE
mapper.select: SELECT quiz_solved FROM user_attendance WHERE user_id = #{userId}
